summary: This .bik file lets you replace the original Bethesda intro for a new one.
descriptionHtml:
You can watch the intro here : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RojUl_1Sd38&feature=youtu.be

Installation :
1. Navigate to your Skyrim video directory (Skyrim\\Data\\Video)
2. Rename the existing BGS_Logo.bik file to BGS_Logo_Original.bik (you\'ll be able to reset later if you want)
3. Download the Replace_Bethesda_Intro.rar and extract the Skyrim Intro.bik to Skyrim\\Data\\Video
4. Rename Skyrim Intro.bik to BGS_Logo.bik
5. Enjoy !
author: felixp771
